# flowsum

Graph Total Premium of a stock. /flowsum, /flowsum wk, /flowsum exp, /flowsum top

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/flowsum [ticker]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker - Not available for subcmd: top | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/flowsum AMD
```
